attributes.action: Government to implement better working hours to support quality of life
attributes.additional_details: I am an employee who has to work 12 hour shifts because my pay rate is rubbishand i cannot choose to work less hours.I hardly take a single day of work i leave my home at 6AM and get back at 8pm.Then i have to eat wash pay bills do shopping.For all of these activities i do not have the time.I urge the government to propose better pay for employees and make it a law to pay more to any person working a longer day than 9 hour shifts.
